pages.text: This chapter will teach you the $(thing)Connected Texture$() logic behind $(thing)Timber Frames$().

pages.heading: Variant Alterations
pages.text: Use variant alterations to achieve seamless connections.

pages.heading: Basic Connections
pages.text: Blocks will always connect to each other unless they are opposite variants $(bold)and$() the same pattern.

pages.heading: Corner Connections
pages.text: Blocks diagonal of each other which do not connect to each other, but do connect to blocks around them will form corners.
